original: khro bo rnams nyi ma'i gdan la g-yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: khro bo rnams nyi ma'i gdan la g-yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa'o //
translated: The wrathful ones stand with their right legs extended on sun seats.

original: de ni sku'i 'khor lo'o //🔽lha bzhi bcu gsum gyi sgyu 'phrul dra ba'o //
analyzed: de ni sku'i 'khor lo'o // lha bzhi bcu gsum gyi sgyu 'phrul dra ba'o //
translated: That is the wheel of awakened body.🔽The net of illusion of forty-three deities.

original: zhe lnga'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba ni /
analyzed: zhe lnga'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba ni /
translated: The net of illusion of forty-five deities is as follows:

original: theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas //
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas //
translated: Abiding in the way of the Mahāyāna,🔽the syllable HA emerges from the right ear.

original: zhes pa ye shes 'khor lo'i steng du rdo rje sems dpa' bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ye shes 'khor lo'i steng du rdo rje sems dpa' bzhugs pa'o //
translated: On the upper spoke of the wheel of pristine consciousness is Vajrasattva.

original: theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog ces pa ye shes 'khor lo'i 'og tu rdo rje dbang phyug ma gdan padma dang zla ba la gnas pa ste zhe lnga'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog ces pa ye shes 'khor lo'i 'og tu rdo rje dbang phyug ma gdan padma dang zla ba la gnas pa ste zhe lnga'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'o //
translated: The phrase “the supreme way of the Great Vehicle” refers to Vajra-bhairava, who is seated on a lotus and moon disc below the wheel of pristine awareness.

original: zhe dgu pa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba ni de'i steng du /🔽byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med //
analyzed: zhe dgu pa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba ni de'i steng du / byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med //
translated: The fifty-ninth stage of the Web of Magical Display is above that.

original: cas pas aa las sna nas ho: cig shar sgor 'phros pas sgo ba dril bu'o //🔽snying rje chen po blo yi mchog / ces pa aa las mig nas h'um cig 'phros pas /
analyzed: cas pas aa las sna nas ho: cig shar sgor 'phros pas sgo ba dril bu'o // snying rje chen po blo yi mchog / ces pa aa las mig nas h'um cig 'phros pas /
translated: The phrase “the nature of great love, immeasurable” refers to a hoṃ syllable that emanates from the nose of aṃ and moves to the eastern gate, where it becomes the gate guardian Ghaṇṭa.

original: nang gi lho'i sgor sgo ba zhags pa'o //🔽shes rab chen po blo chen ldan //🔽zhes pa aa las lce las bam cig 'thon nas /🔽byang gi nang sgor 'phros pas sgo ba lcags sgrog ma'o //
analyzed: nang gi lho'i sgor sgo ba zhags pa'o // shes rab chen po blo chen ldan // zhes pa aa las lce las bam cig 'thon nas / byang gi nang sgor 'phros pas sgo ba lcags sgrog ma'o //
translated: The phrase “great compassion, the supreme mind” refers to a hūṃ syllable that emanates from the eyes of aṃ and moves to the inner southern gate, where it becomes the gate guardian Pāśa.

original: mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba //🔽zhes pa aa las bshad lam nas dza: cig 'thon nas /
analyzed: mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba // zhes pa aa las bshad lam nas dza: cig 'thon nas /
translated: The phrase “great wisdom, endowed with a great mind” refers to a vaṃ syllable that emanates from the tongue of aṃ and moves to the northern inner gate, where it becomes the gate guardian Śṛṅkhalā.

original: nub kyi nang sgor 'phros pas sgo ba lcags kyu'o //
analyzed: nub kyi nang sgor 'phros pas sgo ba lcags kyu'o //
translated: The phrase “great skill, great means” refers to a jaḥ syllable that emanates from the path of speech of aṃ and moves to the western inner gate, where it becomes the gate guardian Ānkuśa.

original: sku mdog gi rigs gong ma bzhin du bsams pas zhe dgu pa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'o //
analyzed: sku mdog gi rigs gong ma bzhin du bsams pas zhe dgu pa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'o //
translated: The color of the body is imagined to be like the previous supreme royal mandala.

original: da ni las rgyal mchog brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni las rgyal mchog brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now, the supreme royal action should be stated.

original: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang ba ni /
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang ba ni /
translated: Inviting the awareness being🔽is as follows: Five-colored light rays radiate from the āḥ in the heart of the awareness being and invite the assembly of deities of the Magical Net from their natural abodes.

original: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i aa las 'od zer kha dog lnga 'phros pas rang bzhin gyi gnas nas sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i lha tshogs spyan drangs nas mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs pa la lha mo brgyad kyis bstod pa bya /
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i aa las 'od zer kha dog lnga 'phros pas rang bzhin gyi gnas nas sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i lha tshogs spyan drangs nas mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs pa la lha mo brgyad kyis bstod pa bya /
translated: They are invited to reside in the space in front. They are praised with the eight goddesses.🔽Then, with the wrathful Vidāraṇa, say jaḥ.🔽With the wrathful Prajñāntaka, say hūṃ.

original: 'dud kyis bstod la de nas khro bo bgegs mthar byed kyis dza: zhes brjod pas dgug / khro bo shes rab mthar byed kyis h'um @205a * //🔽zhes brjod pas gzhug / khro bo gshin rje mthar byed kyis bam zhes brjod pas bcings /
analyzed: 'dud kyis bstod la de nas khro bo bgegs mthar byed kyis dza: zhes brjod pas dgug / khro bo shes rab mthar byed kyis h'um @205a * // zhes brjod pas gzhug / khro bo gshin rje mthar byed kyis bam zhes brjod pas bcings /
translated: With the wrathful Yamāntaka, say vaṃ.

original: khro bo padma mthar byed kyis ho: zhes brjod pas dgyes par bya'o //
analyzed: khro bo padma mthar byed kyis ho: zhes brjod pas dgyes par bya'o //
translated: With the wrathful Padmāntaka, say hoḥ.

original: des dam tshig pa ye shes sems dpa'i rang bzhin du byas so //
analyzed: des dam tshig pa ye shes sems dpa'i rang bzhin du byas so //
translated: That makes the pledge beings the nature of the awareness beings.

original: de nas spyi gtsug dang dpral ba dang mgrin pa dang snying ga dang lte ba dang gsang ba rnams su /
analyzed: de nas spyi gtsug dang dpral ba dang mgrin pa dang snying ga dang lte ba dang gsang ba rnams su /
translated: Then at the crown, forehead, throat, heart, navel, and perineum,

original: ham aom a'a: h'um ho: ksha kha dog so sor 'od zer 'phros 'dus pa las rigs drug gi de bzhin gshegs pa drug tu gyur pas gtso bo la byin gyis brlabs /
analyzed: ham aom a'a: h'um ho: ksha kha dog so sor 'od zer 'phros 'dus pa las rigs drug gi de bzhin gshegs pa drug tu gyur pas gtso bo la byin gyis brlabs /
translated: the colors of haṃ, oṃ, āḥ, huṃ, hoḥ, and kṣa radiate and gather light rays, which transform into the six tathāgatas of the six families. They confer empowerment on the principal figures.

original: 'khor rnams la sku gsung thugs las aom a'a: h'um las rigs gsum du gyur pas byin gyis brlab po //
analyzed: 'khor rnams la sku gsung thugs las aom a'a: h'um las rigs gsum du gyur pas byin gyis brlab po //
translated: The retinue is blessed by the three families of body, speech, and mind, which arise from oṃ, āḥ, and hūṃ.

original: de nas dbang bskur ba ni thugs ka'i aa las 'od zer 'phros pas ye shes kyi lha'i tshogs spyan drangs nas mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs pa la /
analyzed: de nas dbang bskur ba ni thugs ka'i aa las 'od zer 'phros pas ye shes kyi lha'i tshogs spyan drangs nas mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs pa la /
translated: Then the conferral of empowerment: Light rays radiate from the a at the heart and invoke the assembly of awareness beings, who dissolve into the front visualization.

original: mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs pas mchod nas /
analyzed: mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs pas mchod nas /
translated: Make various offerings to them.

original: bdag la dbang bskur cig par gsol ba btab pas /
analyzed: bdag la dbang bskur cig par gsol ba btab pas /
translated: Then supplicate, “Please confer the empowerment on me.”

original: rigs lnga'i de bzhin gshegs pa yab yum gyi bum pa ye shes kyi bdud rtsis gang bas lha rnams kyi spyi bo nas blugs pas lus kyi sgrib pa rnams dag nas /
analyzed: rigs lnga'i de bzhin gshegs pa yab yum gyi bum pa ye shes kyi bdud rtsis gang bas lha rnams kyi spyi bo nas blugs pas lus kyi sgrib pa rnams dag nas /
translated: The vases of the male and female tathāgatas of the five families are filled with the elixir of timeless awareness. The deities pour the elixir on the heads of the deities of the five families, purifying the body obscurations.

original: chu thigs pa re re spyi bor gsal ba las /
analyzed: chu thigs pa re re spyi bor gsal ba las /
translated: Each drop of elixir on their heads is sealed by an Akṣobhya.

original: gtso bo yab yum la mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: gtso bo yab yum la mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: Vairocana seals the principal couple with Vairocana.

original: don grub dang sgrol ma la don grub kyis /
analyzed: don grub dang sgrol ma la don grub kyis /
translated: Amoghasiddhi and Tārā are sealed by Amoghasiddhi.

original: rin 'byung dang gos dkar mo la rin 'byung gis /
analyzed: rin 'byung dang gos dkar mo la rin 'byung gis /
translated: Ratnasambhava and Pāṇḍaravāsinī are sealed by Ratnasambhava.

original: snang mtha' dang m'a ma k'i la snang mthas /
analyzed: snang mtha' dang m'a ma k'i la snang mthas /
translated: Amitābha and Māmakī are sealed by Amitābha.

original: rnam snang dang sangs rgyas spyan la rnam snang gis /
analyzed: rnam snang dang sangs rgyas spyan la rnam snang gis /
translated: Vairocana and Buddhalocanā are sealed by Vairocana.

original: 'khor shar phyogs pa la spyi bor ral gri re /
analyzed: 'khor shar phyogs pa la spyi bor ral gri re /
translated: The retinue in the east is sealed with a sword on their heads.

original: lho phyogs pa la rin po che re /🔽nub phyogs pa la 'khor lo re /
analyzed: lho phyogs pa la rin po che re / nub phyogs pa la 'khor lo re /
translated: The retinue in the south is sealed with a jewel.🔽The retinue in the west is sealed with a wheel.

original: byang phyogs pa la padma re res rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: byang phyogs pa la padma re res rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: The retinue in the north is sealed with a lotus.

original: de nas mchod pa byas gsang ba'i dbang bskur bar gsol ba btab pas /
analyzed: de nas mchod pa byas gsang ba'i dbang bskur bar gsol ba btab pas /
translated: Then make offerings and supplicate for the secret empowerment.

original: rigs lnga yab yum gyi byang chub kyi sems gyi  chu rgyun ngag la bab pas ngag gi sgrib pa dag go //
analyzed: rigs lnga yab yum gyi byang chub kyi sems gyi  chu rgyun ngag la bab pas ngag gi sgrib pa dag go //
translated: The stream of bodhicitta of the five families and their consorts falls on one’s voice, purifying verbal obscurations.

original: yang mchod pa byas nas gsol ba btab pas /
analyzed: yang mchod pa byas nas gsol ba btab pas /
translated: Again, after making offerings and supplicating,

original: mi bskyod pa yab yum der zhugs nas gzhan rigs bzhi po yum bzhi la steng gi yab bzhi zhugs nas 'khyud /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa yab yum der zhugs nas gzhan rigs bzhi po yum bzhi la steng gi yab bzhi zhugs nas 'khyud /
translated: Akṣobhya and his consort enter into union. The other four fathers enter into union with the four mothers above them.🔽The four mothers above enter into union with the four fathers below them.

original: yab bzhi la steng gi yum bzhi zhugs nas 'khyud nas snyoms par zhugs pa las dga' ba bzhi la bzhi bzhi bcu drug nyams su myong bas sems kyi dri ma dag pa ni dbang gsum pa'o //
analyzed: yab bzhi la steng gi yum bzhi zhugs nas 'khyud nas snyoms par zhugs pa las dga' ba bzhi la bzhi bzhi bcu drug nyams su myong bas sems kyi dri ma dag pa ni dbang gsum pa'o //
translated: The experience of the four joys multiplied by four is the purification of mental stains, which is the third empowerment.

original: de nas mi bskyod pa yab yum gyi dbang bzhi pa mi 'gyur pa'i ye shes dang brtan @205b par bsam mo //
analyzed: de nas mi bskyod pa yab yum gyi dbang bzhi pa mi 'gyur pa'i ye shes dang brtan @205b par bsam mo //
translated: Then, imagine that Akṣobhya and his consort confer the fourth empowerment, the timeless awareness of unchanging bliss.

original: da ni gzhan lus sngags kyi rnal 'byor dang / rang lus chos kyi rnal 'byor 'og nas /
analyzed: da ni gzhan lus sngags kyi rnal 'byor dang / rang lus chos kyi rnal 'byor 'og nas /
translated: Now, the yoga of the mantra with another’s body and the yoga of the dharma with one’s own body are below.

original: rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che /
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che /
translated: The vajra sun, great illumination,

original: la sogs pa dang / stong pa chen po yi ge lnga //
analyzed: la sogs pa dang / stong pa chen po yi ge lnga //
translated: and so on, and the five letters of great emptiness,

original: la sogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: la sogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: and so on, will occur.

original: 'dir dag pa de bzhin gyi rnal 'byor ni /
analyzed: 'dir dag pa de bzhin gyi rnal 'byor ni /
translated: Here, the yoga of purity is

original: dag pa rnam thar bzhi dang / dag byed ye shes lnga dang / 'bras bu sku bzhi dang / lam pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang / sku bzhi'i mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: dag pa rnam thar bzhi dang / dag byed ye shes lnga dang / 'bras bu sku bzhi dang / lam pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang / sku bzhi'i mdzad pa'o //
translated: the four purities, the five purifying pristine consciousnesses, the four resultant kāyas, the path of the ten perfections, and the deeds of the four kāyas.

original: de la dag pa rnam thar bzhi ni /
analyzed: de la dag pa rnam thar bzhi ni /
translated: The four purities are

original: srog chen po ni skye ba med //
analyzed: srog chen po ni skye ba med //
translated: the great life is nonarising.

original: tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste //
analyzed: tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste //
translated: It is free from verbal expression.🔽It is the supreme cause of all expressions,

original: brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog / tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed //
analyzed: brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog / tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed //
translated: and it clarifies all words.

original: ces pa mi'i lus khams drug dang ldan pa la sku bzhi rang bzhin gyis gnas pa glo bur gyi dri ma gnyid dang rmi lam dang / sad pa dang bzhi pa'i bag chags kyi dri mas g-yogs pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa mi'i lus khams drug dang ldan pa la sku bzhi rang bzhin gyis gnas pa glo bur gyi dri ma gnyid dang rmi lam dang / sad pa dang bzhi pa'i bag chags kyi dri mas g-yogs pa'o //
translated: The four kāyas naturally abide in the human body endowed with the six elements. It is covered by the stains of the traces of the four: sleep, dreams, waking, and the fourth.

original: srog chen po ni skye ba med //
analyzed: srog chen po ni skye ba med //
translated: The great life is nonarising.

original: ces pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam par thar pa ste /
analyzed: ces pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam par thar pa ste /
translated: This is the liberation of emptiness.

original: phyi nang gi dngos po thams cad gcig dang du mas dpyad na ci'i ngor yang ma grub pa'i phyir na stong pa'o //
analyzed: phyi nang gi dngos po thams cad gcig dang du mas dpyad na ci'i ngor yang ma grub pa'i phyir na stong pa'o //
translated: Since all outer and inner things are not established as any kind of entity when analyzed as one or many, they are empty.

original: stong pa nyid bsgoms pas rang bzhin gyis dag pa la glo bur gyi dri ma yod pa dag nas ye shes su dag pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid bsgoms pas rang bzhin gyis dag pa la glo bur gyi dri ma yod pa dag nas ye shes su dag pa'o //
translated: Since the stains of the temporary defilements are purified in the naturally pure state through meditating on emptiness, the mind is purified as pristine consciousness.

original: tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste //
analyzed: tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste //
translated: It is free from verbal expression.

original: zhes pa mtshan ma med pa ste stong pa nyid de yang rgyu dang mtshan mas stong pa'i phyir na mtshan ma med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa mtshan ma med pa ste stong pa nyid de yang rgyu dang mtshan mas stong pa'i phyir na mtshan ma med pa'o //
translated: Since that emptiness of emptiness is empty of causes and signs, it is signless.

original: de bsgoms pas gnyid mthug po'i dri ma dag pa nas sems chos skur dag pa'o //
analyzed: de bsgoms pas gnyid mthug po'i dri ma dag pa nas sems chos skur dag pa'o //
translated: Since the stain of deep sleep is purified through meditating on that, the mind is purified as the dharmakāya.

original: brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog / ces pa smon pa med pa ste /🔽mtshan ma med pa de yang glo bur du gnyid du 'char ba'i phyir na smon pa med pa ste /
analyzed: brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog / ces pa smon pa med pa ste / mtshan ma med pa de yang glo bur du gnyid du 'char ba'i phyir na smon pa med pa ste /
translated: It is the supreme cause of all expressions.🔽Since that signlessness arises as sleep, it is wishless.

original: de bsgoms pas rmi lam gyi dri ma dag nas ngag longs skur dag pa'o //
analyzed: de bsgoms pas rmi lam gyi dri ma dag nas ngag longs skur dag pa'o //
translated: Since the stain of dreams is purified through meditating on that, the voice is purified as the sambhogakāya.

original: tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed //
analyzed: tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed //
translated: It illuminates all words.

original: ces pa mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o //
translated: It is unconditioned.

original: glo bur ba de yang byed pa po la la ma ltos par rang bzhin 'byung ba'i phyir na mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o //
analyzed: glo bur ba de yang byed pa po la la ma ltos par rang bzhin 'byung ba'i phyir na mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o //
translated: That adventitious [mind] is unconditioned because it arises by nature without depending on any agent.

original: de bsgoms pas sad pa'i gnas skabs dag nas lus sprul pa'i skur dag pa'o //
analyzed: de bsgoms pas sad pa'i gnas skabs dag nas lus sprul pa'i skur dag pa'o //
translated: By meditating on that, the body is purified as the emanation body from the states of sleep.

original: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
analyzed: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
translated: Also, in the Root Tantra:

original: sems dang ngag dang lus dbye bas //
analyzed: sems dang ngag dang lus dbye bas //
translated: The divisions of mind, voice, and body

original: gnyid log rmi lam sad pa dang // bzhi pa'i de nyid ces su grags //
analyzed: gnyid log rmi lam sad pa dang // bzhi pa'i de nyid ces su grags //
translated: are known as the four states of sleep, dream, waking, and the fourth.

original: rmongs pa bla ma'i bka' yis ni //
analyzed: rmongs pa bla ma'i bka' yis ni //
translated: Through the guru’s words, the confused

original: sems dang ngag lus yang dag 'khrugs //
analyzed: sems dang ngag lus yang dag 'khrugs //
translated: truly disturb mind, voice, and body.

original: lus can rnams kyi khu ba shor //🔽@206a * // zhes pa'o //
analyzed: lus can rnams kyi khu ba shor // @206a * // zhes pa'o //
translated: The semen of embodied beings is lost.

original: yang de nyid nas /
analyzed: yang de nyid nas /
translated: Also, in that [tantra]:

original: chags sems dri ma can gyi sems //
analyzed: chags sems dri ma can gyi sems //
translated: The mind of a defiled desirous one

original: 'dzag pas 'khor bar byed pa ste //
analyzed: 'dzag pas 'khor bar byed pa ste //
translated: is caused to circle in samsara through emission.

original: de yi rnam dag sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: de yi rnam dag sbyor ba yis //
translated: Through the application of its purification,

original: dag pa'i rang bzhin dri ma med //
analyzed: dag pa'i rang bzhin dri ma med //
translated: the nature of purity is stainless.

original: ces pa'o // dag byed ye shes lnga ni /
analyzed: ces pa'o // dag byed ye shes lnga ni /
translated: The five pristine consciousnesses that purify are as follows:

original: mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che //
analyzed: mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che //
translated: The great offering is great desire.

original: la sogs te nyon mongs pa lnga lha lnga ru dag / lha lnga ye shes lngar dag pa 'og tu ye shes lnga la bstod pa'i le'u lnga'i mdor bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: la sogs te nyon mongs pa lnga lha lnga ru dag / lha lnga ye shes lngar dag pa 'og tu ye shes lnga la bstod pa'i le'u lnga'i mdor bstan pa yin te /
translated: and so on, the five afflictions are purified as the five deities, and the five deities are purified as the five pristine consciousnesses.

original: mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che //
analyzed: mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che //
translated: The great offering is great desire.

original: sems can thams cad dga' bar byed //
analyzed: sems can thams cad dga' bar byed //
translated: It delights all sentient beings.

original: ces pa 'dod chags dag pas so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te /
analyzed: ces pa 'dod chags dag pas so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te /
translated: Since desire is purified, it is the individually discriminating pristine consciousness.

original: sems can thams cad dga' bar byed pa ni 'dod pa'i longs spyod lnga la mngon bar zhen la 'dod chags che zhes pas mi 'gyur pa'i ye shes chags pa chen pos tha mal pa'i chags pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad dga' bar byed pa ni 'dod pa'i longs spyod lnga la mngon bar zhen la 'dod chags che zhes pas mi 'gyur pa'i ye shes chags pa chen pos tha mal pa'i chags pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: Since it delights all sentient beings, it is great desire, free from ordinary desire with the great desire of unchanging pristine consciousness.

original: de ka thun mong ma yin pa'i mchod pa yin pas che ba'o //
analyzed: de ka thun mong ma yin pa'i mchod pa yin pas che ba'o //
translated: Since that is the uncommon offering, it is great.

original: mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che //
analyzed: mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che //
translated: The great offering is great anger.

original: nyon mongs kun gyi dgra che ba //
analyzed: nyon mongs kun gyi dgra che ba //
translated: It is the great enemy of all afflictions.

original: zhes pa zhe sdang dag pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes te /
analyzed: zhes pa zhe sdang dag pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes te /
translated: Since anger is purified, it is the mirror-like pristine consciousness.

original: tha mal pa'i chags pa dang bral ba ni zhe sdang ste rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: tha mal pa'i chags pa dang bral ba ni zhe sdang ste rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: Free from ordinary attachment, it is aversion, which is by nature luminosity.

original: de nas nyon mongs pa'i dgra chen po'o //
analyzed: de nas nyon mongs pa'i dgra chen po'o //
translated: Then, it is the great enemy of the afflictions.

original: mchod pa chen po gti mug che //
analyzed: mchod pa chen po gti mug che //
translated: The great offering is great delusion.

original: gti mug blo ste gti mug sel //
analyzed: gti mug blo ste gti mug sel //

translated: Abiding in that, the mind is delusion, and being free from the delusion of ignorance, it is removed.🔽The great offering is great wrath.

original: khro ba chen po dgra che ba //
analyzed: khro ba chen po dgra che ba //

original: phrag dog rnam par dag pa bya ba grub pa'i ye shes te /

original: gti mug de la 'du byed kyi rnam rtog mi gnas pas na /
analyzed: gti mug de la 'du byed kyi rnam rtog mi gnas pas na /

original: phrag dog dag pa ste des na khros pa'o //
analyzed: phrag dog dag pa ste des na khros pa'o //

original: khros pa chen po des khro ba bcom pa'o //
analyzed: khros pa chen po des khro ba bcom pa'o //

analyzed: ces pa ser sna dag pas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te /

original: zag med kyi chags pa chen po des ;
analyzed: zag med kyi chags pa chen po des ;
translated: By that great attachment to the uncontaminated,

original: ser sna'i chags pa sel bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: ser sna'i chags pa sel bar byed pa'o //

analyzed: des na nyon mongs pa lnga ye shes lngar dag pa la mchod pa chen po'o //

original: 'bras bu sku bzhi la lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ni /🔽'dod pa chen po bde ba che //
analyzed: 'bras bu sku bzhi la lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ni / 'dod pa chen po bde ba che //

original: dga' ba chen po mgu ba che //

analyzed: de mi 'dzag pas na bde ba'o //

original: de mi 'gyur pas na dga' ba chen po'o //
analyzed: de mi 'gyur pas na dga' ba chen po'o //

original: de la gnas pas mgu ba chen po'o //
analyzed: de la gnas pas mgu ba chen po'o //

original: de la chos kyi sku ni /
analyzed: de la chos kyi sku ni /

original: shes rab mtshon chen 'chang ba ste //

original: snang ba chen po gsal ba che //
analyzed: snang ba chen po gsal ba che //

original: zhes pa chos sku bstan pa ste //
analyzed: zhes pa chos sku bstan pa ste //

analyzed: shes rab kyi lcags kyu des nyon mongs 'joms pa ni dpe glang po che'i sna la lcags kyus btab pa dang 'dra bas so //

analyzed: de chos sku'i ngang la bzhugs kyang grags pa dang snyan pa chen pos 'jig rten khams la khyab pas so //

analyzed: de ye shes kyi snang ba la gnas pas snang ba chen po gsal ba che ba'o //

analyzed: de la longs sku ni / gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste //

analyzed: kha dog che zhing lus bong che //

analyzed: ming yang che zhing rgya che ba //

analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin //

original: zhes pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: zhes pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //

original: lus che ba rgyus ma bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: lus che ba rgyus ma bskyed pa'o //
translated: The great body is not produced by causes.

original: kha dog che ba gcig tu ma nges pa'o //
analyzed: kha dog che ba gcig tu ma nges pa'o //

original: lus bong che ba dbyibs che ba'o //
analyzed: lus bong che ba dbyibs che ba'o //

analyzed: zhes pa tshogs lam sbyor lam pa'i snang bar gyur pa dang gang la gang gis 'dul bar snang ba'i sku ste /

original: mkhas pa ni sems bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: mkhas pa ni sems bskyed pa'o //
translated: The wise one is the one who generates the mind of enlightenment.

analyzed: sgyu 'phrul chen po 'chang ba ni de 'bras bu las 'byung ba'o // des sems can gyi don byed pas don grub pa'o //

analyzed: des don byed pa la sems can dga' ba yin la /

analyzed: de la dgyes par snang bas dga' bas dga' ba'o //
translated: Since he appears to delight in that, he is the one who delights in delight.

analyzed: mig 'phrul can ni sgyu ma'i mkhan pos mig sngags btab pa la rta dang glang po la sogs pa med bzhin du snang ba'o //

original: lam pha rol tu phyin pa bcu ni /
analyzed: lam pha rol tu phyin pa bcu ni /

original: @207a * // sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo ste //
analyzed: @207a * // sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo ste //

analyzed: zhes pa thun mong ba la chos dang zang zing mi 'jigs pa skyabs kyi yin la /

analyzed: chen po dang gtso bor ni nor la yongs su 'dzin pas spangs pa'o //

analyzed: tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba'i mchog / ces pa tshul khrims thun mong ba mi dge ba las log pa yin la /

analyzed: chen po 'chang ba'i mchog ni byang chub sems kyi thig le mi 'dzag pa'o //

analyzed: bzod chen 'chang ba brtan pa po //

analyzed: brtson 'grus chen po brtul ba yin //

analyzed: 'o na sprul skus don bya ba'i rnam rtog yod dam zhe na /

translated: Now, in the deeds of the innate body,

original: mgon po rigs mchog chen po ste //
analyzed: mgon po rigs mchog chen po ste //
translated: the lord is the great supreme clan,

original: bla ma gsang sngags che ba'i mchog / theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas //
analyzed: bla ma gsang sngags che ba'i mchog / theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas //
translated: the guru, the supreme great mantra, abiding in the way of the Great Vehicle,🔽the supreme way of the Great Vehicle.

original: theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog / ces pa la mgon po ni lhan cig skyes pa'i sku mi 'gyur pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog / ces pa la mgon po ni lhan cig skyes pa'i sku mi 'gyur pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The lord is the innate body, unchanging intuition.

original: rigs mchog chen po ni rigs bzhi'i rang bzhin sku bzhi'i mchog tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rigs mchog chen po ni rigs bzhi'i rang bzhin sku bzhi'i mchog tu gyur pa'o //
translated: The great supreme clan is the nature of the four clans, supreme among the four bodies.

original: bla ma ni gong na med pa'o //
analyzed: bla ma ni gong na med pa'o //
translated: The Guru is unsurpassed.

original: gsang sngags ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud man chad kyi spyod yul du ma gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gsang sngags ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud man chad kyi spyod yul du ma gyur pa'o //
translated: The Mantra is not the domain of practice below Yoga Tantra.

original: sngags che ba'i mchog ni rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i spyod yul du gyur pa ye shes kyi sku'o //
analyzed: sngags che ba'i mchog ni rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i spyod yul du gyur pa ye shes kyi sku'o //
translated: The supreme great Mantra is the wisdom body, which is the domain of practice of the highest Yoga.

original: theg pa chen po'i tshul la @208a * //
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i tshul la @208a * //
translated: Abiding in the way of the Great Vehicle

original: gnas pa ni nyan thos dang rang rgyal ma yin pa'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: gnas pa ni nyan thos dang rang rgyal ma yin pa'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: is the Great Vehicle that is not the Hearer or Solitary Realizer Vehicle.

original: theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa las kyang khyad par du gyur pa gsang sngags bla na med pa'i theg pa la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa las kyang khyad par du gyur pa gsang sngags bla na med pa'i theg pa la gnas pa'o //
translated: The supreme way of the Great Vehicle is abiding in the unsurpassed Mantra Vehicle, which is distinguished from even the Bodhisattva Vehicle.

original: de ltar le'u lnga pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: de ltar le'u lnga pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: Thus is the explanation of the fifth chapter.

original: // / da ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes la bstod pa brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: // / da ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes la bstod pa brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now, the praise of the wisdom of the Element of Attributes will be stated.

original: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che //
translated: The Buddha is Great Vairochana,

original: thub pa chen po thub chen ldan //
analyzed: thub pa chen po thub chen ldan //
translated: the Great Sage, endowed with great sagehood.

original: zhes pa la dang po dbyings kyi rnal 'byor ni dkyil 'khor drug rim gyis bsgom pa ltar na /
analyzed: zhes pa la dang po dbyings kyi rnal 'byor ni dkyil 'khor drug rim gyis bsgom pa ltar na /
translated: The first of these, the yoga of the dhātu, is as follows.

original: sngar rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo dang po'i sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpas gtso bo byas pa de 'pho ba ste /
analyzed: sngar rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo dang po'i sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpas gtso bo byas pa de 'pho ba ste /
translated: If one is meditating on the six maṇḍalas in sequence, the principal figure of the maṇḍala of the vajra dhātu, the primordial buddha Vajrasattva, is transferred.

original: mi bskyod pa nub kyi le tshe la bzhugs /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa nub kyi le tshe la bzhugs /
translated: Akṣobhya resides in the western square.

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma rlung gi mtshams kyi le tshe la bzhugs /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma rlung gi mtshams kyi le tshe la bzhugs /
translated: Vajra­dhātu­vajrī resides in the square in the northwest.

original: dbus kyi le tshe la rnam par snang mdzad dang yum sangs rgyas spyan zhal sbyor du bzhugs pa sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni rang gi sngar bzhin no //
analyzed: dbus kyi le tshe la rnam par snang mdzad dang yum sangs rgyas spyan zhal sbyor du bzhugs pa sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni rang gi sngar bzhin no //
translated: Vairocana and his consort Buddhalocanā reside in the central square in union, with the same color and implements as before.

original: yab kyi thugs ka'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la ye shes sems dpa' shes rab ye shes zhes bya ba zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa sku mdog ser po /
analyzed: yab kyi thugs ka'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la ye shes sems dpa' shes rab ye shes zhes bya ba zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa sku mdog ser po /
translated: The gnosis being, the wisdom of wisdom, resides in the center of the sun maṇḍala in the heart of the father. It has one face and two arms and is yellow in color.

original: g-yon 'khor lo dang / g-yas na ral gri bsnams pa rdo rje skyil krung du zhugs pa de'i thugs ka nas 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa la /
analyzed: g-yon 'khor lo dang / g-yas na ral gri bsnams pa rdo rje skyil krung du zhugs pa de'i thugs ka nas 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa la /
translated: At his heart is a ten-spoked wheel,

original: aom pradzny'a dzny'a na m'u rta ye na ma:zhes pa gnas pa'o //
analyzed: aom pradzny'a dzny'a na m'u rta ye na ma:zhes pa gnas pa'o //
translated: on which is the mantra Oṃ prajñājñānamūrtaye namaḥ.

original: de'i lte ba la aa ser po gnas par bsam mo //
analyzed: de'i lte ba la aa ser po gnas par bsam mo //
translated: In its center is a yellow A.

original: nub kyi 'khor sngar ser po yin pa la mi bskyod pa'i rigs ljang gur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nub kyi 'khor sngar ser po yin pa la mi bskyod pa'i rigs ljang gur 'gyur ro //
translated: The retinue in the west is yellow, but the Akṣobhya family becomes green.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum ni rigs so so la thim pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum ni rigs so so la thim pa'o //
translated: Vajrasattva and consort dissolve into the individual families.

original: dkyil 'khor drug rang rkyang par bsgom na dang po gnas srung ba nas tha ma dbang bskur ba yan chad gong bzhin bsgoms pa la 'og tu /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor drug rang rkyang par bsgom na dang po gnas srung ba nas tha ma dbang bskur ba yan chad gong bzhin bsgoms pa la 'og tu /
translated: If you meditate on the six maṇḍalas separately, meditate on the protection of the site and so on, up to the empowerment, as above.

original: mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang //
analyzed: mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang //
translated: The first supreme one, the holder of the three buddha bodies,

original: sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can //
translated: the nature of the five buddha bodies,

original: khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag / sangs rgyas lnga bdag cod pan can //🔽zhes pa dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag / sangs rgyas lnga bdag cod pan can //🔽zhes pa dang sbyar ro //
translated: the lord of all, the nature of the five pristine consciousnesses,🔽the lord of the five buddhas, the crown ornament.

original: 'jig rten pa'i dbang bcu rnam dag dad bcas pa dang // 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang bcu gcig pa dang / dbang bskur slob ma'i mtshan nyid dang slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid dang / theg pa gsum dang / dbang bzhi thun mong du bstan pa dang /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i dbang bcu rnam dag dad bcas pa dang // 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang bcu gcig pa dang / dbang bskur slob ma'i mtshan nyid dang slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid dang / theg pa gsum dang / dbang bzhi thun mong du bstan pa dang /
translated: The three vehicles, and the common teaching of the four initiations,🔽The characteristics of the result, the four bodies,

original: 'bras bu sku bzhi'i mtshan nyid dang / sbyor ba'i yan lag drug @208b bstan pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu sku bzhi'i mtshan nyid dang / sbyor ba'i yan lag drug @208b bstan pa'o //
translated: And the teaching of the six-branched yoga.

original: de rnams la dang po //
analyzed: de rnams la dang po //
translated: Among those, first,

original: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che //
translated: The great Buddha Vairocana,

original: thub pa chen po thub chen ldan //
analyzed: thub pa chen po thub chen ldan //
translated: The great sage, endowed with great sagehood,

original: zhes pa sangs rgyas ni rigs lnga'i nang nas sku'i rigs so //
analyzed: zhes pa sangs rgyas ni rigs lnga'i nang nas sku'i rigs so //
translated: Buddha is the body family among the five families.

original: 'og min du lha bzhi bcu zhe gsum mam zhe lnga'am zhe dgu'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ngo bor bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: 'og min du lha bzhi bcu zhe gsum mam zhe lnga'am zhe dgu'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ngo bor bzhugs pa'o //
translated: He resides in Akaniṣṭha in the essence of the net of illusions of forty-three, forty-five, or forty-nine deities.

original: thub pa chen po ni sku gsung thugs thub pa'o //
analyzed: thub pa chen po ni sku gsung thugs thub pa'o //
translated: Great sage is the sage of body, speech, and mind.

original: thub chen ldan ni 'gyur pa'i ye shes mnga' bas so //
analyzed: thub chen ldan ni 'gyur pa'i ye shes mnga' bas so //
translated: Endowed with great sagehood is possessing the gnosis of transformation.

original: de'i rgyu gang zhe na /
analyzed: de'i rgyu gang zhe na /
translated: What is the cause of that?

original: gsang sngags tshul chen las byung ba //
analyzed: gsang sngags tshul chen las byung ba //
translated: It arises from the great way of mantra.

original: gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyi can //
analyzed: gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyi can //
translated: It is the great way of mantra itself.

original: zhes pas gsang sngags tshul chen las byung ba ni dbang bcu ste /
analyzed: zhes pas gsang sngags tshul chen las byung ba ni dbang bcu ste /
translated: The ten powers arise from the great way of mantra.

original: chu dang cod pan dang dar dbyangs dang rdo rje dril bu dang brtul zhugs dang ming dang rjes gnang dang bdun slob ma'i dbang ngo //
analyzed: chu dang cod pan dang dar dbyangs dang rdo rje dril bu dang brtul zhugs dang ming dang rjes gnang dang bdun slob ma'i dbang ngo //
translated: The seven initiations of the water, the crown, the ribbon, the vajra and bell, the conduct, the name, and the permission are the student initiations.

original: brgyad pa bum pa'i dbang slob dpon gyi'o //
analyzed: brgyad pa bum pa'i dbang slob dpon gyi'o //
translated: The eighth is the vase initiation, which is for the master.

original: dgu pa gsang ba'i dbang ngo //
analyzed: dgu pa gsang ba'i dbang ngo //
translated: The ninth is the secret initiation.

original: bcu pa shes rab ye shes te 'jig rten pa'i dbang ngo //
analyzed: bcu pa shes rab ye shes te 'jig rten pa'i dbang ngo //
translated: The tenth is the initiation of wisdom knowledge, which is a worldly initiation.

original: gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang ni bcu gcig pa bzhi pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang ni bcu gcig pa bzhi pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The eleventh initiation, called the fourth, is the supramundane initiation, which is the great way of mantra itself.

original: dbang bzhi pa bum pa la sogs pa'i dbang ni 'phags pa'i yul na gnas pa rnams la sbas nas gsal bar mdzad do //
analyzed: dbang bzhi pa bum pa la sogs pa'i dbang ni 'phags pa'i yul na gnas pa rnams la sbas nas gsal bar mdzad do //
translated: The four initiations of the vase and so forth are hidden from those who live in the land of the āryas and are revealed to them.

original: de cis she na /
analyzed: de cis she na /
translated: Why is that?

original: snod min pa la nor la bltas nas chos ston pa dang // nor med na mi dge ba bcu srung ba rnams la mi ster ba'i phyir dbang gsal bar ma mdzad do //
analyzed: snod min pa la nor la bltas nas chos ston pa dang // nor med na mi dge ba bcu srung ba rnams la mi ster ba'i phyir dbang gsal bar ma mdzad do //
translated: It is not bestowed on those who are not suitable vessels, because they teach the Dharma while looking at wealth, and because they do not give it to those who guard the ten non-virtues if they are not wealthy.

original: dbang gsum pa shes rab ye shes ni /
analyzed: dbang gsum pa shes rab ye shes ni /
translated: The third empowerment, the wisdom empowerment,

original: de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa'i ye shes la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yin te /
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa'i ye shes la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yin te /
translated: is like that, and the fourth empowerment is the wisdom of the Buddha.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu tha dad med par byed pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhes smra bar gyur to //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu tha dad med par byed pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhes smra bar gyur to //
translated: Because it is taught by the Bhagavān that the cause and effect are not different.

original: de'i phyir 'di rnam par dag pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ster bar byed pa dang po mchog gi sangs rgyas las rab tu gsal bar byed pa glegs bam du bris pa ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di rnam par dag pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ster bar byed pa dang po mchog gi sangs rgyas las rab tu gsal bar byed pa glegs bam du bris pa ste /
translated: Therefore, this bestows the supreme siddhi of pure mahāmudrā, and it is clearly taught by the supreme Buddha in the first [tantra], written in a book.

original: chu bo si ta'i byang phyogs su skal ba dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi mos pa mkhyen nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa dang / phyag na rdo rjes glegs bam du bris so //
analyzed: chu bo si ta'i byang phyogs su skal ba dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi mos pa mkhyen nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa dang / phyag na rdo rjes glegs bam du bris so //
translated: To the north of the Sītā River, the Bhagavān taught it for the sake of fortunate sentient beings, knowing their aspirations, and Vajrapāṇi wrote it in a book.

original: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa tshad mar byas te /🔽gang gis sems can the tshom med par gyur pa des sngags kyi theg pa thams cad kyi nges pa'i don sngags kyi theg pa las mtshan yang dag par brjod pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag @209a * //
analyzed: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa tshad mar byas te / gang gis sems can the tshom med par gyur pa des sngags kyi theg pa thams cad kyi nges pa'i don sngags kyi theg pa las mtshan yang dag par brjod pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag @209a * //
translated: Taking the recitation of the name as authoritative,🔽the Bhagavat taught the mantra vehicle of the definitive meaning of all mantra vehicles to Vajrapani,

original: na rdo rje la bstan to //
analyzed: na rdo rje la bstan to //
translated: so that sentient beings would be without doubt.

original: des na bdag gi gnas skabs gsum ste /
analyzed: des na bdag gi gnas skabs gsum ste /
translated: Thus, there are three states:

original: btags pa ba cha mthun pa mtshan nyid pa'o //
analyzed: btags pa ba cha mthun pa mtshan nyid pa'o //
translated: The nominal concordant class is the nominal one.

original: las dang po skye bar skyes pa la btags pa tsam mo //
analyzed: las dang po skye bar skyes pa la btags pa tsam mo //
translated: The beginner is the nominal one.

original: tshogs dang sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa la dbang cha mthun pa tsam mo //🔽sa dang po nas bcu pa'i bar du 'jig rten pa'i dbang yin te dbang mtshan nyid pa'o //
analyzed: tshogs dang sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa la dbang cha mthun pa tsam mo // sa dang po nas bcu pa'i bar du 'jig rten pa'i dbang yin te dbang mtshan nyid pa'o //
translated: The one who is endowed with the perfection of the accumulations and application is the concordant class.🔽From the first stage up to the tenth stage, it is the mundane stage, and is the nominal one.

original: sa bcu gcig pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang ngo //
analyzed: sa bcu gcig pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang ngo //
translated: The eleventh stage is the supramundane stage.

original: des na dbang la mtshan nyid pa ni dbang bdun bskur ba'i chu'i ming can byin gyis brlabs pas sa bdun par lung bstan la dge bsnyen du brjod do //
analyzed: des na dbang la mtshan nyid pa ni dbang bdun bskur ba'i chu'i ming can byin gyis brlabs pas sa bdun par lung bstan la dge bsnyen du brjod do //
translated: Therefore, the true empowerment is the one called the water empowerment, which is conferred in the seven empowerments. By the consecration, the disciple is predicted to the seventh stage.

original: dge tshul du bum pa'i dbang bskur bas sangs rgyas kyi sras gzhon nu zhes sa brgyad pa mi g-yo bar lung bstan to //
analyzed: dge tshul du bum pa'i dbang bskur bas sangs rgyas kyi sras gzhon nu zhes sa brgyad pa mi g-yo bar lung bstan to //
translated: By conferring the vase empowerment, the disciple becomes a novice monk, and is predicted to the eighth stage, the immovable.

original: gsang ba'i dbang bskur bas dge slong du gyur te rgyal tshab gzhon nu zhes sa dgu pa legs pa'i blo gros su lung bstan pas gnas brtan zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i dbang bskur bas dge slong du gyur te rgyal tshab gzhon nu zhes sa dgu pa legs pa'i blo gros su lung bstan pas gnas brtan zhes bya'o //
translated: By conferring the secret empowerment, the disciple becomes a fully ordained monk, and is predicted to the ninth stage, excellent wisdom.

original: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur bas slob ma sdud par byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur bas slob ma sdud par byed par 'gyur te /
translated: By conferring the wisdom-awareness empowerment, the disciple becomes a monk who attracts disciples.

original: sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin du lung bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas gnyis pa bzhin no //
analyzed: sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin du lung bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas gnyis pa bzhin no //
translated: Because he is predicted to the tenth stage, cloud of truth, he is like a second buddha.

original: de'i phyir na rig ma bcu khyim pa'i slob ma la slob dpon gyis gtad par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir na rig ma bcu khyim pa'i slob ma la slob dpon gyis gtad par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the ten awareness consorts are entrusted to the master by the disciple who is a householder.

original: 'dir rtsa ba'i rgyud las bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'dir rtsa ba'i rgyud las bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
translated: Here, the root tantra states:

original: tsha mo dang ni sring mo dang // de bzhin sring mo'i skyed byed ma //🔽de ltar chung ma'i skyed byed ma //
analyzed: tsha mo dang ni sring mo dang // de bzhin sring mo'i skyed byed ma // de ltar chung ma'i skyed byed ma //
translated: and the wife’s producer in that way.

original: ma mo de bzhin bud med rnams //
analyzed: ma mo de bzhin bud med rnams //
translated: Mother, likewise women,🔽and the wife of father, uncle, and brother,

original: pha khu spun gyi chung ma dang // de bzhin tsha mo skyed byed ma //
analyzed: pha khu spun gyi chung ma dang // de bzhin tsha mo skyed byed ma //
translated: and likewise the niece’s producer,

original: rang gi ma dang tsha mo dang // rang gi chung ma mchog gi gzugs //
analyzed: rang gi ma dang tsha mo dang // rang gi chung ma mchog gi gzugs //
translated: one’s own mother, niece, and one’s own wife, the supreme form.

original: sgrol ma la sogs chos kyi khams //
analyzed: sgrol ma la sogs chos kyi khams //
translated: Tārā and so forth are the phenomena realm.

original: rig ma bcu po rang rig skyes //
analyzed: rig ma bcu po rang rig skyes //
translated: The ten knowledge consorts are self-arisen.

original: dbang gi dus su rab tu sbyin //
analyzed: dbang gi dus su rab tu sbyin //
translated: They are given at the time of empowerment.

original: thar pa 'dod pas gzung bar bya //
analyzed: thar pa 'dod pas gzung bar bya //
translated: They should be held by those who desire liberation.

original: zhes pas rig ma bcus dbang bskur ba yin no //
analyzed: zhes pas rig ma bcus dbang bskur ba yin no //
translated: Thus, the empowerment is conferred by the ten knowledge consorts.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang / sa bcu dang / shes pa bcu dang / stobs bcu dang / yi ge bcu'i brda'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang / sa bcu dang / shes pa bcu dang / stobs bcu dang / yi ge bcu'i brda'o //
translated: The ten perfections, the ten levels, the ten knowledges, the ten powers, and the ten syllables are the symbolic meanings.

original: sna tshogs don ni ma lus byed //
analyzed: sna tshogs don ni ma lus byed //
translated: The one who performs all the various meanings without exception,

original: rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba po //
analyzed: rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba po //
translated: the one who is powerful in the ten aspects, the great one.

original: zhes pa brda yin te //
analyzed: zhes pa brda yin te //
translated: This is the symbolic meaning.

original: hkshmlwryam 'di la phyi dang nang dang gzhan du bshad pa yod pa 'dir ma spros te /
analyzed: hkshmlwryam 'di la phyi dang nang dang gzhan du bshad pa yod pa 'dir ma spros te /
translated: This has explanations of outer, inner, and other, but I will not elaborate on that here.

original: 'grel pa chen por shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'grel pa chen por shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood in the Great Commentary.

original: 'dir dbang rnam dag dang bcas pa'i phyir bkong pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir dbang rnam dag dang bcas pa'i phyir bkong pa'o //
translated: Here, since the pure empowerments are conferred, there is the empowerment.

original: pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste //
analyzed: pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste //
translated: The ten perfections are obtained.

original: zhes pa rig ma bcu la brten nas dbang bcu thob pas pha rol tu phyin pa bcur dag pas @209b thob pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa rig ma bcu la brten nas dbang bcu thob pas pha rol tu phyin pa bcur dag pas @209b thob pa'o //
translated: Since the ten empowerments are obtained in dependence on the ten knowledge consorts, the ten perfections are obtained.

original: pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas //
analyzed: pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas //
translated: Abiding in the ten perfections.

original: zhes pa dbang dang po thob pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa dbang dang po thob pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: Since the first empowerment is obtained, it is the perfection of generosity.

original: de ltar dbang re re la pha rol tu phyin pa re re dag nas slob dpon la stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang gsang dbang la smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar dbang re re la pha rol tu phyin pa re re dag nas slob dpon la stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang gsang dbang la smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: In that way, since each perfection is purified in each empowerment, the perfection of power is in the master empowerment, the perfection of aspiration is in the secret empowerment, and the perfection of wisdom is in the wisdom empowerment.

original: de pha rol tu phyin bcu dag pa ste /
analyzed: de pha rol tu phyin bcu dag pa ste /
translated: That is the purification of the ten perfections.

original: de ka la /
analyzed: de ka la /
translated: That itself is

original: pha rol phyin pa bcu yi tshul //
analyzed: pha rol phyin pa bcu yi tshul //
translated: the way of the ten perfections.

original: zhes pa pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dag pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dag pa'o //
translated: This is the purity of the ten perfections.

original: mgon po sa bcu'i dbang phyug ste //
analyzed: mgon po sa bcu'i dbang phyug ste //
translated: Lord, master of the ten stages,

original: sa bcu la ni rab tu gnas //
analyzed: sa bcu la ni rab tu gnas //
translated: firmly abiding on the ten stages.

original: zhes pa dbang bcu thob pas sa bcu thob pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa dbang bcu thob pas sa bcu thob pa ste /
translated: This is the attainment of the ten stages through the attainment of the ten powers.

original: chu dbang gis ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa'o //
analyzed: chu dbang gis ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa'o //
translated: By the power of water, the stage of the Joyous.

original: de bzhin du rim pa ji ltar dri ma med pa dang 'od byed pa dang / 'od zer 'phro ba dang / sbyang dka' ba dang / mngon du gyur pa dang / ring du song ba dang / mi g-yo ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du rim pa ji ltar dri ma med pa dang 'od byed pa dang / 'od zer 'phro ba dang / sbyang dka' ba dang / mngon du gyur pa dang / ring du song ba dang / mi g-yo ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros dang /
translated: Likewise, in order, the stages of Stainless, Shining, Brilliance, Hard to Conquer, Approaching, Gone Afar, Immovable, Excellent Intelligence,

original: chos kyi sprin rnams thob pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi sprin rnams thob pa'o //
translated: and Cloud of Dharma are attained.

original: shes bcu rnam dag bdag nyid can //
analyzed: shes bcu rnam dag bdag nyid can //
translated: Having the nature of the purity of the ten knowledges,

original: zhes pa rig ma bcu pha rol tu phyin pa bcur shes par bya ba dang sa bcur shes par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa rig ma bcu pha rol tu phyin pa bcur shes par bya ba dang sa bcur shes par bya'o //
translated: one should understand the ten consorts as the ten perfections and the ten stages.

original: shes bcu rnam dag 'chang ba po //
analyzed: shes bcu rnam dag 'chang ba po //
translated: Holder of the purity of the ten knowledges,🔽having the nature of the ten consorts, one should understand the ten perfections and the ten stages.🔽Holder of the purity of the ten knowledges

original: zhes pa / shes rab ye shes la brten nas mi 'dzag pa'i ye shes thob par 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa / shes rab ye shes la brten nas mi 'dzag pa'i ye shes thob par 'chang ba'o //
translated: is the holder of the attainment of the unmoving pristine consciousness based on the pristine consciousness of wisdom.

original: rnam pa bcu po don bcu'i don //
analyzed: rnam pa bcu po don bcu'i don //
translated: The ten aspects are the meaning of the ten topics.

original: zhes pa de sems can gyi don byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa de sems can gyi don byed pa'o //
translated: This is the benefit of sentient beings.

original: don gang gis byed na /
analyzed: don gang gis byed na /
translated: By what means does he benefit?🔽The Lord of Sages is the lord of the pervasion of the ten powers.

original: thub dbang stobs bcu khyab pa'i bdag / ces pa stobs bcu ni /
analyzed: thub dbang stobs bcu khyab pa'i bdag / ces pa stobs bcu ni /
translated: The ten powers are:

original: bsam pa'i stobs dang / lta ba'i stobs dang / sbyor ba'i stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs dang / smon lam gyi stobs dang / theg pa'i stobs dang / spyod pa'i stobs dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs dang / byang chub pa'i stobs dang /
analyzed: bsam pa'i stobs dang / lta ba'i stobs dang / sbyor ba'i stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs dang / smon lam gyi stobs dang / theg pa'i stobs dang / spyod pa'i stobs dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs dang / byang chub pa'i stobs dang /
translated: the power of intention, the power of view, the power of application, the power of wisdom, the power of aspiration, the power of vehicle, the power of conduct, the power of manifestation, the power of enlightenment,

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i stobs so //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i stobs so //
translated: and the power of turning the wheel of Dharma.

original: stobs rnams thob par byed pa ni dbang bcu yin te /
analyzed: stobs rnams thob par byed pa ni dbang bcu yin te /
translated: The attainment of the powers is the ten masteries.

original: sna tshogs don ni ma lus byed //
analyzed: sna tshogs don ni ma lus byed //
translated: He performs all the various benefits.

original: rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba po //
analyzed: rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba po //
translated: The great one with the ten masteries.

original: zhes pa 'jig rten pa'i dbang bcu'i brda gang du yi ge bcu brtsegs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa 'jig rten pa'i dbang bcu'i brda gang du yi ge bcu brtsegs pa'o //
translated: The ten worldly masteries are the ten syllables stacked up.

original: bskur ba'i dbang bcu bskur pas thag pa'i dbang bcu ni byang chub sems dpa'i dbang bcur 'gyur te /
analyzed: bskur ba'i dbang bcu bskur pas thag pa'i dbang bcu ni byang chub sems dpa'i dbang bcur 'gyur te /
translated: The ten empowerments of the conferred empowerment become the ten empowerments of the bodhisattva.

original: tshe la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / shin tu mos pa la dbang pa dang / yod byad la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang ba dang / sems la dbang ba @210a * //
analyzed: tshe la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / shin tu mos pa la dbang pa dang / yod byad la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang ba dang / sems la dbang ba @210a * //
translated: mastery of prayer,🔽mastery of miracles,🔽mastery of the Dharma,🔽mastery of mind,🔽mastery of birth,

original: dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / ye shes la dbang ba'o //
analyzed: dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / ye shes la dbang ba'o //
translated: and mastery of gnosis.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi gnas skabs gsungs pa rnal 'byor pa dang po sems bskyed la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi gnas skabs gsungs pa rnal 'byor pa dang po sems bskyed la /
translated: The Bhagavān has taught the stages of the yogis. The beginner yogi generates the mind of enlightenment.

original: phyis byis par gyur pa de nas gzhon nur gyur pa'o //
analyzed: phyis byis par gyur pa de nas gzhon nur gyur pa'o //
translated: Later, he becomes a child, then a youth.

original: las dang po'i sbyor ba skyes pa sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa /
analyzed: las dang po'i sbyor ba skyes pa sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa /
translated: The beginner is one who has given rise to the practice. The one with perfect practice

original: bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa /
analyzed: bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa /
translated: is one with perfect intention.

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur thob pa /
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur thob pa /
translated: The one who has attained the irreversible consecration

original: skye ba gcig tu thogs pa zhes so //
analyzed: skye ba gcig tu thogs pa zhes so //
translated: is the one obstructed by a single birth.

original: de ltar 'jig rten pa'i dbang bcu bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar 'jig rten pa'i dbang bcu bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the ten mundane masteries,

original: da ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang bcu gcig pa brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang bcu gcig pa brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now, the eleven supramundane powers should be mentioned.

original: thog ma med pa spros med bdag / de bzhin nyid bdag dag pa'i bdag / ces pa nas /
analyzed: thog ma med pa spros med bdag / de bzhin nyid bdag dag pa'i bdag / ces pa nas /
translated: The first is the power of the beginningless, the unelaborate, the nature of suchness, the pure nature,

original: gnyis su med dang gnyis med ston //🔽yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas //
analyzed: gnyis su med dang gnyis med ston // yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas //
translated: the nondual, the teacher of nonduality,

original: zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: zhes sbyar ro //
translated: and the one who abides in the limit of reality.

original: thog ma med pa ni ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: thog ma med pa ni ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The beginningless is the nature of nonarising.🔽Elabora

original: spros pa ni rtag chad dang bral ba dmigs pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: spros pa ni rtag chad dang bral ba dmigs pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: tion is free from permanence and annihilation, free from reference points.

original: de bzhin nyid ni ma bcos pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ni ma bcos pa'o //
translated: Suchness is unfabricated.

original: de'i bdag po ni dag pa'i bdag ces dag pa ni glo bur gyi dri ma dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: de'i bdag po ni dag pa'i bdag ces dag pa ni glo bur gyi dri ma dang bral ba'o //
translated: Its nature is the pure nature. Purity is free from temporary stains.

original: gnyis su med pa dang ni yul dang yul can nam dbyings dang ye shes so //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa dang ni yul dang yul can nam dbyings dang ye shes so //
translated: Nonduality is the subject and object, or the dhātu and wisdom.

original: des na lhan cig skyes pa'i don la gnas pas na gnyis med ston pa'o //
analyzed: des na lhan cig skyes pa'i don la gnas pas na gnyis med ston pa'o //
translated: Therefore, since it abides in the meaning of the connate, it is the teacher of nonduality.

original: yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas //
analyzed: yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas //
translated: It abides in the limit of reality.

original: zhes pa yang dag pa ma nor ba thob par bya ba'i phyir don thob pas mngon du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa yang dag pa ma nor ba thob par bya ba'i phyir don thob pas mngon du gyur pa'o //
translated: In order to attain the authentic, unerring, one manifests the attainment of the goal.

original: de ltar dbang bcu gcig bstan nas dbang bskur bar bya ba'i slob ma ni /
analyzed: de ltar dbang bcu gcig bstan nas dbang bskur bar bya ba'i slob ma ni /
translated: Having thus explained the eleven initiations, the disciple who is to be initiated

original: bden par smra zhing tshig mi 'gyur //
analyzed: bden par smra zhing tshig mi 'gyur //
translated: is one who speaks the truth, whose word is not altered,

original: ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed //
analyzed: ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed //
translated: who does as he says,

original: ces pa ste bden par smra ba ni snod kyi dri ma dag pa g-yo dang sgyu spangs pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa ste bden par smra ba ni snod kyi dri ma dag pa g-yo dang sgyu spangs pa'o //
translated: who speaks the truth, whose vessel is pure, who has abandoned deceit and fraud.

original: tshig mi 'gyur pa ni dam bcas pa las mi 'da' ba'o //🔽ji skad smras pa ni slob dpon kyi  bka'o //
analyzed: tshig mi 'gyur pa ni dam bcas pa las mi 'da' ba'o // ji skad smras pa ni slob dpon kyi  bka'o //
translated: Whose word is not altered, who does not transgress his promise.🔽Who does as he says is the word of the master.

original: de bzhin byed pa ni slob ma'i bka' yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin byed pa ni slob ma'i bka' yin te /
translated: Who does as he says is the word of the disciple.

original: dbang bdun pa thob pas bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa dang / brgyad pa thob pas gzhan gyi don dbang dang rab gnas dang slob ma bsdu bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbang bdun pa thob pas bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa dang / brgyad pa thob pas gzhan gyi don dbang dang rab gnas dang slob ma bsdu bar bya'o //
translated: Having obtained the seventh initiation, he should cultivate the stage of generation; having obtained the eighth, he should perform the initiation of others, consecration, and the gathering of disciples.

original: gsang ba thob pas bde ba chen po bsgom pa dang / shes rab ye shes thog pas bde ba stong par go ba dang / dbang bcu gcig pa thob pas lhan cig skyes pa bsgom pa dang / de rnams kyi dam tshig la gnas pas de bzhin byed pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba thob pas bde ba chen po bsgom pa dang / shes rab ye shes thog pas bde ba stong par go ba dang / dbang bcu gcig pa thob pas lhan cig skyes pa bsgom pa dang / de rnams kyi dam tshig la gnas pas de bzhin byed pa'o //
translated: By abiding in the pledges of those [initiations], one acts accordingly.

original: de ltar slob ma bstan nas //
analyzed: de ltar slob ma bstan nas //
translated: Having thus taught the disciple,

original: slob dpon gyi tshad dam mtshan nyid ni lam @210b gang la gnas pa dang / don gang gis bya ba'o //
analyzed: slob dpon gyi tshad dam mtshan nyid ni lam @210b gang la gnas pa dang / don gang gis bya ba'o //
translated: the measure or definition of the master is abiding in the path and acting for the sake of others.

original: dang po ltar na //
analyzed: dang po ltar na //
translated: First,

original: bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan //
analyzed: bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan //
translated: endowed with the lion's roar of selflessness,

original: mu stegs ri dags ngan 'jigs byed //
analyzed: mu stegs ri dags ngan 'jigs byed //
translated: frightening the evil beasts of the tīrthikas.

original: ces pa bdag med pa la gnyis te /
analyzed: ces pa bdag med pa la gnyis te /
translated: The selflessness mentioned here is twofold.

original: gang zag gi bdag med pas mu stegs las khyad par du byas pas dper na seng ge'i sgras ri dags bzhin no //
analyzed: gang zag gi bdag med pas mu stegs las khyad par du byas pas dper na seng ge'i sgras ri dags bzhin no //
translated: By the selflessness of persons, one is distinguished from the tīrthikas, like the lion's roar frightening the beasts.

original: chos kyi bdag med pas nyan thos las khyad par du byas pas dpe gong ma bzhin te /
analyzed: chos kyi bdag med pas nyan thos las khyad par du byas pas dpe gong ma bzhin te /
translated: By the selflessness of phenomena, one is distinguished from the śrāvakas, like the above example.

original: de ni tshogs lam dang sbyor ba'i lam la gnas pa'i slob dpon no //
analyzed: de ni tshogs lam dang sbyor ba'i lam la gnas pa'i slob dpon no //
translated: He is the master who abides in the path of accumulation and the path of preparation.

original: kun du 'gro ba'i don yod stobs //
analyzed: kun du 'gro ba'i don yod stobs //
translated: He has the power of unfailing universal activity.

original: zhes pa kun du 'gro ba ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gsum gyi stong chen por ro //
analyzed: zhes pa kun du 'gro ba ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gsum gyi stong chen por ro //
translated: Universal means the buddha field of a billion-world universe.

original: don yod pa'i stobs ni sems can gyi don du ste sa dang po nas bdun pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: don yod pa'i stobs ni sems can gyi don du ste sa dang po nas bdun pa'i bar du'o //
translated: The power of unfailing means for the sake of sentient beings, from the first to the seventh bhumi.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid ltar mgyogs //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid ltar mgyogs //
translated: He is as swift as the mind of the tathagatas.

original: zhes pas nyan thos su phyir mi ldog pas de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'am cha mthun pa brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pas nyan thos su phyir mi ldog pas de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'am cha mthun pa brgyad pa'o //
translated: This is the eighth bhumi, which is similar to or in accord with the tathagatas because it is irreversible as a shravaka.

original: rgyal ba dgra rgyal rnam par rgyal //
analyzed: rgyal ba dgra rgyal rnam par rgyal //
translated: He is the victor, the conqueror of the enemy.

original: zhes pa las dang nyon mongs pa las rgyal bas sa bcu skye ba gcig gis thob pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa las dang nyon mongs pa las rgyal bas sa bcu skye ba gcig gis thob pa'o //
translated: This is the tenth bhumi, which is attained in one life through victory over karma and affliction.

original: 'khor los sgyur pa stobs po che //
analyzed: 'khor los sgyur pa stobs po che //
translated: He is the universal monarch, the great power.

original: zhes pa sa bcu gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa sa bcu gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
translated: This is the twelfth bhumi, the tathagata.

original: de ltar lam gang na gnas pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar lam gang na gnas pa bstan nas /
translated: Having explained in which path one abides,

original: don gang gi bya ba la /
analyzed: don gang gi bya ba la /
translated: now, in which activity does one engage?

original: tshogs kyi slob dpon tshogs kyi mchog / ces bya ba la sogs te /
analyzed: tshogs kyi slob dpon tshogs kyi mchog / ces bya ba la sogs te /
translated: The master of the assembly, the best of assemblies, and so on.

original: tshogs kyi ni tshogs lam man chad pa'i sems can rnams la'o //
analyzed: tshogs kyi ni tshogs lam man chad pa'i sems can rnams la'o //
translated: The assembly is the sentient beings below the path of accumulation.

original: slob dpon ni de'i'o //
analyzed: slob dpon ni de'i'o //
translated: The master is the one who has that.

original: tshogs kyi mchog ni sbyor ba'i lam mo //
analyzed: tshogs kyi mchog ni sbyor ba'i lam mo //
translated: The best of assemblies is the path of preparation.

original: yang tshogs rje ni sbyor lam pa'o //
analyzed: yang tshogs rje ni sbyor lam pa'o //
translated: Again, the lord of the assembly is the one on the path of preparation.

original: tshogs bdag ni mthong lam pa'o //
analyzed: tshogs bdag ni mthong lam pa'o //
translated: The owner of the assembly is the one on the path of seeing.

original: dbang dang ldan ni sa dang po pa des dbang mtshan nyid pa thob pas so //
analyzed: dbang dang ldan ni sa dang po pa des dbang mtshan nyid pa thob pas so //
translated: The one who is powerful is the one on the first ground, because he obtains the actual empowerment.

original: mthu chen ni sa dang po pa de'o //🔽de'i slob dpon ni zhes pa 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: mthu chen ni sa dang po pa de'o // de'i slob dpon ni zhes pa 'dzin pa ste /
translated: The one of great power is the one on the first ground.

original: phyir mi ldog pa la gnas pa'i sa brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa la gnas pa'i sa brgyad pa'o //
translated: His master is the one who holds the name, the one on the eighth ground who abides in irreversibility.

original: tshul chen ni sa brgyad pa slob ma'o //
analyzed: tshul chen ni sa brgyad pa slob ma'o //
translated: The one of great discipline is the disciple on the eighth ground.

original: gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa ni sangs rgyas kho na'o //🔽de la tshig gi rje ni don la mkhas pas rje'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa ni sangs rgyas kho na'o // de la tshig gi rje ni don la mkhas pas rje'o //
translated: The one who is not dependent on others is the Buddha alone.🔽Among them, the lord of words is the lord because he is skilled in the meaning.

original: des ni tshig bdag chos gsungs pa'i gsung la dbang thob pa'o //
analyzed: des ni tshig bdag chos gsungs pa'i gsung la dbang thob pa'o //
translated: Therefore, he is the master of words, having obtained power over the speech that teaches the Dharma.

original: smra mkhas pa ni don phyin ci ma log par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: smra mkhas pa ni don phyin ci ma log par bstan pa'o //
translated: Eloquence is teaching the meaning without error.

original: des na tshig la dbang ba tshig mtha' yas /
analyzed: des na tshig la dbang ba tshig mtha' yas /
translated: Therefore, having mastery over words is having infinite words.

original: zhes pa gsung gcig gsungs kyang du mar go ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa gsung gcig gsungs kyang du mar go ba'o //
translated: Even though a single word is spoken, it is understood as many.

original: tshig bden pa dang bden par smra //
analyzed: tshig bden pa dang bden par smra //
translated: Speaking the truth and speaking truthfully

original: zhes pas rang rang gi skad du don go ba dan don nges par ston par go ba'o /
analyzed: zhes pas rang rang gi skad du don go ba dan don nges par ston par go ba'o /
translated: means that the meaning is understood in one's own language and the meaning is understood to be taught definitively.

original: @211a * // de ltar slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bstan nas da ni theg pa gsum dang dbang bzhi thun mong du bstan pa ni /
analyzed: @211a * // de ltar slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bstan nas da ni theg pa gsum dang dbang bzhi thun mong du bstan pa ni /
translated: Having explained the characteristics of the master, now, the explanation of the four common empowerments and the three vehicles is as follows:

original: de la thun mong gi theg pa las nyan thos kyi ni /
analyzed: de la thun mong gi theg pa las nyan thos kyi ni /
translated: Among them, the śrāvakas of the common vehicle

original: bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po //
analyzed: bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po //
translated: are the teachers of the four truths.

original: phyir mi ldog par phyir mi 'ong //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog par phyir mi 'ong //
translated: The nonreturners do not return.

original: zhes pa bden pa bzhi ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam gyi bden pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa bden pa bzhi ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam gyi bden pa'o //
translated: The four truths are the truths of suffering, origin, cessation, and the path.

original: ston pa po ni bcom ldan 'das te nyan thos rnams la'o //
analyzed: ston pa po ni bcom ldan 'das te nyan thos rnams la'o //
translated: The teacher is the Bhagavān, for the śrāvakas.

original: phyir mi ldog pa phyir mi 'ong ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa'o //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa phyir mi 'ong ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa'o //
translated: The nonreturner who does not return is the stream enterer, the once returner, the nonreturner, and the arhat.

original: de ltar zung bzhi dang ya brgyad de nyan thos rnams so //
analyzed: de ltar zung bzhi dang ya brgyad de nyan thos rnams so //
translated: Thus, there are four pairs and eight individuals, the śrāvakas.

original: rang rgyal ni /
analyzed: rang rgyal ni /
translated: The pratyekabuddha is as follows:

original: 'dren pa rang rgyal bse ru'i tshul //
analyzed: 'dren pa rang rgyal bse ru'i tshul //
translated: The leader is the pratyekabuddha who is like a rhinoceros.

original: nges 'byung sna tshogs las byung ba //
analyzed: nges 'byung sna tshogs las byung ba //
translated: Arising from various forms of renunciation,

original: 'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig po //
analyzed: 'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig po //
translated: they have a single cause, the great elements.

original: zhes pas rang rgyal ba ni sngon du bskal ba mang por tshogs bsags nas /
analyzed: zhes pas rang rgyal ba ni sngon du bskal ba mang por tshogs bsags nas /
translated: Having previously accumulated the collections for many eons,🔽they reflect on the faults of cyclic existence and make aspirations to attain buddhahood in a place without a teacher.

original: 'khor ba'i skyon la bsams nas slob dpon med pa'i sa phyogs su sangs rgyas par smon lam btab nas der skyes pas rten 'brel lugs 'byung dang lugs bzlog bsgoms pas rang rgyal bar gyur pa'o //🔽de la 'dren pa ni ne tso ltar khyung lding pa'i rang rgyal lo //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i skyon la bsams nas slob dpon med pa'i sa phyogs su sangs rgyas par smon lam btab nas der skyes pas rten 'brel lugs 'byung dang lugs bzlog bsgoms pas rang rgyal bar gyur pa'o // de la 'dren pa ni ne tso ltar khyung lding pa'i rang rgyal lo //
translated: They are born there and meditate on the forward and reverse sequences of dependent origination and become pratyekabuddhas.🔽The leader is the pratyekabuddha who soars like a garuḍa.

original: bse ru'i tshul ni gcig pur gnas pa'i rang rgyal ba'o //
analyzed: bse ru'i tshul ni gcig pur gnas pa'i rang rgyal ba'o //
translated: The rhinoceros-like one is the pratyekabuddha who lives alone.

original: de gang gi dbang gis na nges 'byung zhes pa sngar 'khor ba las blo log pa'o //
analyzed: de gang gi dbang gis na nges 'byung zhes pa sngar 'khor ba las blo log pa'o //
translated: What is it the power of? It is renunciation, because one's mind has turned away from cyclic existence.

original: sna tshogs pa ni sngar tshogs bsags pas so //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa ni sngar tshogs bsags pas so //
translated: It is various, because one has previously accumulated the collections.

original: las 'byung ba ni de'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: las 'byung ba ni de'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: It is an occurrence, because it is the result of that.

original: 'byung ba chen po ni rang rgyal ba'i byang chub po //
analyzed: 'byung ba chen po ni rang rgyal ba'i byang chub po //
translated: It is a great occurrence, because it is the enlightenment of a pratyekabuddha.

original: rgyu gcig po ni rgyu dkar po dang nag po 'dres pa ma nges pas dge ba'i las kho na las grub pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu gcig po ni rgyu dkar po dang nag po 'dres pa ma nges pas dge ba'i las kho na las grub pa'o //
translated: It is a single cause, because it is accomplished only from virtuous karma, since it is not certain that a mixture of virtuous and nonvirtuous causes will occur.

original: theg pa chen po pa ni /
analyzed: theg pa chen po pa ni /
translated: The Mahayana

original: dge slong dgra bcom zag pa zad //
analyzed: dge slong dgra bcom zag pa zad //
translated: is for the monk who is an arhat, whose defilements are exhausted,

original: ces pa la sogs pa ni dge slong ni dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa yin pas theg pa chen po'i rten no //
analyzed: ces pa la sogs pa ni dge slong ni dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa yin pas theg pa chen po'i rten no //
translated: and so on. The monk is the basis of the Mahayana, because he is intent on virtuous dharmas.

original: dgra bcom pa ni lam ste bdag med pa gnyis kyis nyon mongs pa'o //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa ni lam ste bdag med pa gnyis kyis nyon mongs pa'o //
translated: The arhat is the path, because he has destroyed the afflictions with the two kinds of selflessness.

original: zag pa zad pa ni 'bras bu ste /
analyzed: zag pa zad pa ni 'bras bu ste /
translated: The exhaustion of the defilements is the result,

original: 'khor bar gnas pa'i rgyud zad pas sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: 'khor bar gnas pa'i rgyud zad pas sangs rgyas so //
translated: because he is a buddha, since the continuum of remaining in cyclic existence is exhausted.

original: 'dod chags bral bas dbang po thul //
analyzed: 'dod chags bral bas dbang po thul //
translated: He is free from attachment, because he has subdued the faculties.

original: zhes pa yul la chags pa dang bral bas dbang po rnams rang zhi ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa yul la chags pa dang bral bas dbang po rnams rang zhi ba'o //
translated: Thus, by being free from attachment to objects, the senses are naturally pacified.

original: bde ba rnyed pa ni chags pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: bde ba rnyed pa ni chags pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: The attainment of bliss is the result of freedom from attachment.

original: des na bdud dang nyon mongs las mi 'jigs pa thob pa'o //
analyzed: des na bdud dang nyon mongs las mi 'jigs pa thob pa'o //
translated: Therefore, one attains fearlessness from demons and afflictions.

original: bsil bar gyur pa ni zhe sdang la sogs pa'i byed las so //
analyzed: bsil bar gyur pa ni zhe sdang la sogs pa'i byed las so //
translated: Being cool is the function of anger and so on.

original: rnyog @211b pa med pa ni chos nyid rang bzhin gyis dangs pa la glo dur gyi dri ma dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: rnyog @211b pa med pa ni chos nyid rang bzhin gyis dangs pa la glo dur gyi dri ma dang bral ba'o //
translated: Being unmuddied is being free from the stains of the mire of the naturally clear dharmatā.

original: thun mong ma yin pa gsang sngags kyi dbang dang sbyar na //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa gsang sngags kyi dbang dang sbyar na //
translated: When applied to the uncommon empowerment of secret mantra,

original: bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po //
analyzed: bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po //
translated: the one who teaches the four truths

original: zhes pa ston pa bo ni gong du bshad pa'i slob dpon de'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ston pa bo ni gong du bshad pa'i slob dpon de'o //
translated: is the teacher explained above.

original: bden ba ni mi slu ba ste don dam bar ro //
analyzed: bden ba ni mi slu ba ste don dam bar ro //
translated: The truth is undeceiving, ultimately.

original: bzhi ni dbang ste bum pa dang / gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes dang bzhi pa ste mdor bstan pa'o //
analyzed: bzhi ni dbang ste bum pa dang / gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes dang bzhi pa ste mdor bstan pa'o //
translated: The four are the empowerments: the vase empowerment, the secret empowerment, the gnosis of the wisdom consort empowerment, and the fourth empowerment.

original: rgyas pa las /
